1. Yaml

Download http://code.google.com/p/yaml-cpp/downloads/detail?name=yaml-cpp-0.5.1.tar.gz&can=2&q= and extract it here
dir structure should end up looking like
dependencies/yaml-cpp-version/include

2. Panda3D

Go here: https://www.panda3d.org/download.php?sdk
Click the version you would like to download, only tested version is 1.8.1
Don't click the free one-click download. Click your operating system.
Download the complete source code
extract to this folder.
go to panda3d\direct\src\dcparser and rename dcParser.h.prebuilt to dcParser.h
If done correctly, folder structure should be
dependencies/panda3d/dtool
